<details><summary>Tool use: **code_edit** • Edit file: src/components/dashboard/Sidebar.tsx</summary>

Remove the Pro plan conditionality so all tabs (including Request Portal and Admin) are visible to all users, regardless of their plan. This means removing the isProUser logic and using navItems directly instead of filteredNavItems.

**Chunk 1**
Lines added: 7, lines removed: 7

```diff

-   const isProUser = user?.app_metadata?.plan === &quot;pro&quot; || false;
-   const filteredNavItems = navItems.filter(item =&gt; {
-     if ((item.name === &quot;Request Portal&quot; || item.name === &quot;Admin&quot;) &amp;&amp; !isProUser) {
-       return false;
-     }
-     return true;
-   });
```

---

I've removed the Pro plan conditionality from the sidebar navigation. Now, all tabs—including "Request Portal" and "Admin"—will be visible to all users, regardless of their plan.

If there are any other areas in the app where Pro plan restrictions affect tab or feature visibility, let me know and I can update those as well. Would you like to remove Pro plan checks from any other part of the app, or is the sidebar change sufficient?

---
